content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I previously used the "write_to_file" command to save the top 10 kayaking routes in Norway recommended by Eirik Verås Larsen to a file named "top_kayaking_routes.txt". The paddling code for safety was also included in the text. 

Recently, I used the "write_to_file" command to save information about the creation of a new lake in the Arkansas River corridor in a file named "lake_creation.txt". The project involves an $8.2 million investment to create a new reinforced shoreline and dam to hold water as deep as 10 feet. The project is dependent on reaching an agreement with the Muscogee Nation to create a Tax Increment Financing District to pay for the infrastructure.

I attempted to execute a Python code to draw a river using turtle graphics, but encountered an error due to a missing library. I used the "execute_shell" command to install the missing library "python3-t

I used the "google" command to search for the cheapest flight options to Norway and the best lodging and equipment rental options for kayaking in Norway. I then used the "browse_website" command to gather information from the Skyscanner and Visit Norway websites, which provided
"""

Telemark Canal\\n\\nPaddling code for safety:\\n- Always wear a life jacket\\n- Never paddle alone\\n- Bring a map and compass\\n- Be prepared for changing weather conditions\\n\\nFor more information and tips, visit https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/top-places-to-paddle/"}}}', type='ai_response')]
